ygData.subject: Scrounge (Rare Spawn)
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anybody have any information on the rare spawn wolf in Southern Ro called Scrounge?  I heard that he drops the Scrounge Claw, which is 5 Dmg  30 Dly.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Does anybody have any information on the rare spawn
wolf in Southern Ro called Scrounge? I heard that he
drops the Scrounge Claw, which is 5 Dmg 30 Dly. I
know that it isn't a great weapon, but it sure as hell
looks cool!!! Looks like the Demon Claw (Thulian
Claw).

I would greatly appreciate any information on this, as
I am going to try and camp for this beast tonight. I
hope he isn't above lvl 21, because then he will be
wearing a Sedaien Claw! :)

Thanks,
Sedaien Reyvon
lvl 21 bard of Solusek Ro
